text:
Hi all. Do you know if there is a hubl variable which would return current date? I only found `{{year}}.`

The reason why I am looking for it:  In module I am fetching hubdb (`using hubdb_table_rows`) which has date column. And I want to get only rows which have date set in future.
or this one {% set current_time_and_date = local_dt|unixtimestamp %}
Hi Thank you! This is exactly what I was looking for. :+1:
How do we access the same but when there are multiple recipients to the email?
